name: Butter Up!
description:
My first game jam :) sorry for the clunky physics, all credit for the music goes to Amras.  You can find it on https://soundcloud.com/amras0000/im-flinging-butter-at-the-ceiling-fan-to-see-if...

I hope the collision isn't too unbreadable - heh - and that you'll find the writing amusing. I'll try to add better notifications too.

(I'm so tired that for some reason I thought unbearable can make a pun with bread. Apparently, it can't. I'm not imbreadssed).
